title: Лесник
overview: Fate brought the former special forces soldier Leonid Zubov to the remote taiga hinterland. It seemed to him that it was here that he would find the long-awaited peace and his favorite job, but a quiet life, apparently, was not for him. Crime is raging in the village. Locals are tired of poaching, illegal business and banditry, but they cannot protect themselves. Zubov is not used to staying away. Together with his friends and the smart dog Red, he declares war on lawlessness.
